entry.title: WIND WARNING, Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 p.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
